name: ghost in the CRT
description:
🩸 goop loop #5 💧

happy HENHalloween 2k21 🎃👻💀 // from Voxeljunk w/💖

video loop with sound. video synthesized primarily with LZX Industries Castle series DIY modules. captured with Elgato Game Capture HD60 S into OBS Studio. visual effects and post-production applied in TouchDesigner. audio created almost entirely with Teenage Engineering OP-1 with arrangement, sound effects and editing added in Ableton Live.
